whatSellQuestion: What can you sell on Soum?
whatSellAnswer: Soum is a platform where millions of people around Saudi Arabia connect to sell and buy used devices. You can sell mobiles, smart watches, tablets, laptops, headphones, gaming, and desktops.
howSellWorksAnswer: See more information in our terms and conditions

title.two: Ship with all ease for free

description.one: List your device and let people buy it with a price you define
description.two: Upon device sale, ship it for free to buyer via nearest selected shipping carrier branch.
description.three: We will secure your payment and transfer the amount to you after the sale

startSellingDescription: In just few minutes, you will be able to sell your electronics in Soum’s App. Download now and start earning money!

heading.one: How can I list my product for sale on the platform?
heading.two: I could not find a suitable classification for my product, what shall I do?
heading.three: What happens when my product gets sold?
heading.four: How will my product be delivered to the buyer?

content.one: After logging in through the application or the browser, select "Sell now" icon, then you can add your product’s pictures and answer the question to determine the device condition
content.two: Meanwhile, you can only sell products that have a classification on the platform. New categories and products will be added soon
content.three: The product will be picked up from you and delivered to the buyer. Within 24 hours of delivery, the amount will be deposited into your bank account
content.four: We take care of all costs related to your product delivery process from the moment we pick it up from you to delivering it to the buyer

caption: See more information in our terms and conditions
